about_the_game:
Mannequin is a 2D character portrait generator which is designed for video game developers (especially visual novels and JRPGs) and VTubers! Using this app, you can create full-body character portraits with various poses, clothing styles, hairstyles and expressions. VTuber models with face tracking are also available as an export option via Inochi2D, an open source standard developed as an alternative to Live2D.

Mannequin is fine-tuned with ease of use as its focus. If you're an artist or have an artist in your team, you will find Mannequin's simple interface useful for quick prototyping. If you're not an artist, then you'll find that its high-quality output can match a lot of other games' art, so you can confidently use it for production.

You are free to use any of your exported character files in your personal and commercial projects.

content_descriptors.notes: Due to the nature of the app as a character designer/generator tool, nude body for both male and female are available. However, there are no nipples and/or genitalia shown regardless of gender or body type.

detailed_description:
Mannequin is a 2D character portrait generator which is designed for video game developers (especially visual novels and JRPGs) and VTubers! Using this app, you can create full-body character portraits with various poses, clothing styles, hairstyles and expressions. VTuber models with face tracking are also available as an export option via Inochi2D, an open source standard developed as an alternative to Live2D.

Mannequin is fine-tuned with ease of use as its focus. If you're an artist or have an artist in your team, you will find Mannequin's simple interface useful for quick prototyping. If you're not an artist, then you'll find that its high-quality output can match a lot of other games' art, so you can confidently use it for production.

You are free to use any of your exported character files in your personal and commercial projects.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Ubuntu 14.04+, Debian 8+, openSUSE 13.3+, or Fedora Linux 24+
  • Processor: Quad-Core, 1.2 GHz 64-bit processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel/AMD Integrated Graphics, or better
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Ubuntu 14.04+, Debian 8+, openSUSE 13.3+, or Fedora Linux 24+
  • Processor: Quad-Core, 1.6 GHz 64-bit processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel/AMD Integrated Graphics, or better
  • Storage: 700 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Big Sur or later
  • Processor: Quad-Core, 1.2 GHz 64-bit processor, Intel/Apple Silicon
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Integrated Graphics, or better
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Big Sur or later
  • Processor: Quad-Core, 1.6 GHz 64-bit processor, Intel/Apple Silicon
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Integrated Graphics, or better
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
